plant.description: A tuberous perennial with heart-shaped leaves and upswept petals. Common houseplant and garden flower.

toxins.name: Cyclanin
toxins.description: A triterpenoid saponin that causes severe irritation and can destroy red blood cells (hemolysis).

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.notes: Often bloody; caused by saponin irritation.

symptoms.name: Cardiac Arrhythmias
symptoms.notes: Associated with tuber ingestion; can be fatal.

treatments.name: Decontamination
treatments.description: Rinse mouth with water to remove irritants.

treatments.name: Gastrointestinal Support
treatments.description: Withhold food/water (fasting) until vomiting stops, then bland diet.

treatments.name: Symptomatic Care
treatments.description: Anti-seizure meds and cardiac support if severe signs develop.
